overview: From 2025-07-22 to 2025-07-23, ethereum-optimism/specs had 0 new PRs (0 merged), 0 new issues, and 1 active contributors.

topContributors.summary: 0x00101010: Primarily focused on dependency updates, merging a significant PR in ethereum-optimism/optimism (#16785) that updated the op-geth dependency based on geth v1.16.1, involving substantial code changes. Their work also included bugfix contributions, with a focus on tests and code modifications across 22 files.
gtrepta: Focused on development work, opening a pull request titled "Supervisor Fuzzing" in ethereum-optimism/optimism (#16791).

maximevtush: Focused on code clarity and maintainability within the `optimism` repository, opening two PRs (ethereum-optimism/optimism#16782, ethereum-optimism/optimism#16781) to rename test harnesses for improved understanding, primarily impacting test files.
pcw109550: Created a new issue, ethereum-optimism/optimism#16778, to support the sync namespace within the op-sync-tester.
